text: See also Kensington Gardens, South Australia, a suburb of Adelaide, Australia Kensington Gardens, once the private gardens of Kensington Palace, is one of the Royal Parks of London, lying immediately to the west of Hyde Park. Most of it is in the City of Westminster, but a small section to the west is in the Royal Borough of Kensington and Chelsea. It covers 275 acres (1.1 kmÂ²). == Other websites == * Kensington Gardens , official website * Kensington gardens landscape architecture * Article on Kensington Gardens * The Garden a poem by Ezra Pound set in Kensington Gardens Category:Parks in the United Kingdom Category:Buildings and structures in the City of Westminster Category:Buildings and structures in the Royal Borough of Kensington and Chelsea
title: Kensington Gardens
